name: SAWCOP
description:
You are SAWCOP, mostly man, ALL SAW. You have been dispatched to deal with an issue at Bunnings Tower. The Claw Backs, a gang of hammer men, have taken it over and you need to get in there and save the hostages. 

NOW GET TO WORK SAWCOP!

CONTROLS
________________________________

Controller
Thumbstick - Move clockwise/anticlockwise
A - Shoot/Confirm

_______________________________

Keyboard
Left|right - Move clockwise/anticlockwise
Space - Shoot/Confirm

Created for Disc Room Game Jam by myself and Michael (@RichardWizard)

Music by Gabe Miller
